name: Twinfold
description: A roguelike about merging golden babies and squashing angry faces.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
